channel.title: Making myself admin on my server
channel.description:
:confused: i just made my own hamachi server..and i have no godam clue how to make myself admin...the server is Phonescape source and i have no clue..ive gone into the file "data" in my phonescape folder and i went to the mod file and put in my name and saved it and another wierd thing is, there is no admins file!? :confused:
some1 please help so i cant start advertiseing my server

item.title: Making myself admin on my server
item.dc:creator: @matmanblock matmanblock
item.description:
@matmanblock wrote:

Did you compile it after you changed your player rights to 3?

Read full topic

i must go to map chathers that u see yours name u see rights thats normal 0 make it 3 save it and log uot and in than u are when it ondt work than u must are not loggen in on our server do what is say first and than log in than u are and do ::master for 185 i have same scoure

item.title: Making myself admin on my server
item.dc:creator: @F00L_I_K0 F00L I K0
item.description:
@F00L_I_K0 wrote:

Go to “Chracters” double click your account name. Scroll down until you see “Player rights” change the number after that to 3.

Read full topic
